meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michele Bassett Randal Allred John Haynes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4438.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Michele Bassett, a stay-at-home mom from McLean, Virginia
Randal Allred, a college professor from Laie, Hawaii
John Haynes, a meteorologist from Alexandria, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,599)

tr.td: PRESIDENTS & CHERRIES
THE NEW YORK YANKEES
THROW IT OVER HERE
NATIONAL FOODS
THE KIDS' TABLE
